Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.smoothstreaming.SsMediaSource.Factory.createMediaSource(SsManifest, Handler, MediaSourceEventListener)
    Use createMediaSource(SsManifest) and BaseMediaSource.addEventListener(Handler, MediaSourceEventListener) instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.smoothstreaming.SsMediaSource.Factory.createMediaSource(Uri, Handler, MediaSourceEventListener)
    Use createMediaSource(Uri) and BaseMediaSource.addEventListener(Handler, MediaSourceEventListener) instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.smoothstreaming.SsMediaSource.Factory.setMinLoadableRetryCount(int)
    Use setLoadErrorHandlingPolicy(LoadErrorHandlingPolicy) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.smoothstreaming.offline.SsDownloadAction(Uri, boolean, byte[], List<StreamKey>)
    Use SsDownloadAction.createDownloadAction(Uri, byte[], List) or SsDownloadAction.createRemoveAction(Uri, byte[]).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.smoothstreaming.SsMediaSource(SsManifest, SsChunkSource.Factory, Handler, MediaSourceEventListener)
    Use SsMediaSource.Factory instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.smoothstreaming.SsMediaSource(SsManifest, SsChunkSource.Factory, int, Handler, MediaSourceEventListener)
    Use SsMediaSource.Factory instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.smoothstreaming.SsMediaSource(Uri, DataSource.Factory, ParsingLoadable.Parser<? extends SsManifest>, SsChunkSource.Factory, int, long, Handler, MediaSourceEventListener)
    Use SsMediaSource.Factory instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.smoothstreaming.SsMediaSource(Uri, DataSource.Factory, SsChunkSource.Factory, Handler, MediaSourceEventListener)
    Use SsMediaSource.Factory instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.smoothstreaming.SsMediaSource(Uri, DataSource.Factory, SsChunkSource.Factory, int, long, Handler, MediaSourceEventListener)
    Use SsMediaSource.Factory instead.
